title: (4595) Penamaior -
description: On top of a hill overlooking the surrounding urban area, a quiet place with some trees. Not clean everywhere. Small tourist attraction: a large chair (Trono panomarico do Marco Branco).

title: (4580) Lordelo - 100 Avenida Joaquim Mota
description: Green areas and filling and emptying service.

title: (4580) Lordelo - 100 Avenida Joaquim Mota
description: Quiet place with an excellent green park

title: (4825) - Rua Senhora do Padrão
description: Spot away from the main road. calm. at the archaeological site of "Castro de monte padrao". Walks and views. accessible all vehicles. no services. flat terrain.

title: (4825) Monte Córdova - CM1105
description: In the middle of nature in quiet forest next to the church of the assumption In addition if you are there on August 15 provide two nights for large market Mass and processions of the assumption. For the day only

title: (4780) Couto (S. Miguel) - 382 Rua Padre Luís Gonzaga Martins Pinheiro
title_short: (4780) Couto (S. Miguel) - 382 Rua Padre Luís Gonzaga Martins Pinheiro
description: Large only day parking lot of the chapel and cemetery of Santo Tirso. Flat but not everywhere. Along a local service road. Toilet next to the chapel.

address.street: 382 Rua Padre Luís Gonzaga Martins Pinheiro

title: (4580) Bitarães - 342 Rua D`Além
description: A parking lot at the edge of the road which is nothing exceptional but which has the merit of being flat and with a lot of parking spaces (parking lot in 2 parts). We spent one night there and apart from the fact that there are quite a few passing cars, we weren't bothered.

title: (4580-127) Paredes - 23 Rua Dona Rosalina Guimarães
description: Large parking area in the village, a little inclined.

title: (4585) Gandra - 513 Rua dos Casais
description:
Gigantic parking lot. And calm!

Suitable for overnight, if not just a football match is raging.

title: (4580) Paredes - 14 Avenida João Paulo II
description: Large car park near the center of Paredes with many shops, quiet on weekends. Free without service..

title: (4780) Santo Tirso - 152 Rua Mãe d'Água
description: Free service area next to Jumbo.

title: (4780) Santo Tirso - 44 Rua do Casal Velho
title_short: (4780) Santo Tirso - 44 Rua do Casal Velho
description: Good place, quiet for the night, street. Services within walking distance.

title: (4780) Santo Tirso - 115 Travessa das Rãs
description: 3 parking spaces, reserved for motorhomes, monitored by camera, quiet at night, bakery 50m away, emptying area 400m away at the Auchan store. Shims required.

title: (4620-696) Lousada - 1 Rua General Humberto Delgado
description:
Only Vehicles <3500 kg

Paved and illuminated parking lot (50x200 mtr) in the center of Lousada.  Opposite municipal swimming pool and fresh market.  Slightly inclined and close to a traffic road.  Lots of high trees.

title: () Valongo -
description: Very nice place with a great view of the city and beautiful sunset in the evening at night you can hear the dogs barking. The driveway is not for large motorhomes, it goes over a gravel road with some potholes, but I got up easy with my T5 2WD. if you have a four wheel drive this area is perfect lots of options

title: (4440) Valongo - Unnamed Road
description: High place, with beautiful views and quiet. It is near a swing that is frequently visited during the day but to sleep it is a very good place. Access is by quite broken tracks and with a lot of inclination, recommended 4x4.

title: (4780-368) Santo Tirso - 5 Largo Abade Pedrosa
description: It is the square of the cathedral is a quiet and beautiful place to walk

title: (4440-703) Valongo -
description: Up a tough climb in 2WD but easy in 4x4. view of the whole quiet city and 360 degree panorama

title: (4440-578) Valongo -
description: Uncontrolled parking. Access by dirt and gravel road, but easily doable by van. Nice view of the surrounding towns. Calm.

title: (4780) - 361 Rua Rabada
description: Next to a wonderful park. We spent the night as enjoyed the facilities in the morning. Workout area, agility, river…

title: (4780) Fonte da Galega - 116 Rua Saudade
description: Quiet park

title: (4560) Guilhufe - Rua de Subpena
description: Free service area, overnight possible but too close to the road, possible spaces just below but not tested.

title: (4440-238) Valongo - 65 Avenida do Conhecimento
description: Parking next to the Valongo library and opposite the Valongo shopping center. We parked in battle, we took 3 seats but since it is not very busy there was no problem. We slept a night, a little passage but once the CC closed there is more passage so quieter. Toilets, cafeteria and free wifi at the commercial center

title: (4560) Penafiel - Rua Zona Indústrial II
description: Intermarché with gas station, air, water and laundry.

title: (4440) Valongo - Rua António Augusto Castro Paupério
title_short: (4440) Valongo - Rua António Augusto Castro Paupério
description: Park with all services and parking, no supermarket Intermarché.

title: (4560) Penafiel - 9293 Rua Victorino da Costa
description: Big parking located in the town center

title: (4560) Penafiel - 43 Rua Dom Inácio e São Caetano
title_short: (4560) Penafiel - 43 Rua Dom Inácio e São Caetano
description: Gala station for LPG

address.street: 43 Rua Dom Inácio e São Caetano

title: (4560) Paço de Sousa - 24 Rua Egas Moniz
title_short: (4560) Paço de Sousa - 24 Rua Egas Moniz
description: Small parking in front of the GNR, with a small park in front

title: (4560) Penafiel - 233 Travessa Atafona
description: On the edge of a new road not yet frequented enough, very nice view, quiet, ideal for one night

title: (4560) Penafiel - 413 Rua Vista Alegre
description: Laundry Self Service

title: (4440) Campo - 902 Rua de São João
description: Large parking lot with toilets. Came here because of the great climbing offer in the immediate vicinity.

title: (4560) Penafiel - 239 Avenida Zeferino de Oliveira
description: Sameiro Church car park.

title: (4745-514) Sao Romao do Coronado - 1006 Rua Horizonte
title_short: (4745-514) Sao Romao do Coronado - 1006 Rua Horizonte
description: Small but nice place. Perfect location 5 minutes walk to the train to the city center. Outdoor showers, toilets and a bar. Pay via envelope and mailbox.

title: (4560-221) Marecos - n.º1279 Rua de Santo André
title_short: (4560-221) Marecos - n.º1279 Rua de Santo André
description: Magikland parking is a very wide esplanade of land to be able to leave the AC while you visit the amusement park with the children

title: (4560) Penafiel - Variante Cavalum
description: Free parking next to a beautiful park. Very quiet and beautiful area right next to the Magikland amusement park. Toilets opened from 9:00 till 19:00, 250 m from the parking (behind the bar in the park)

title: (4560) Penafiel - Rua da Igreja
description: Overnight parking without services, ideal for visiting the Magikland

title: (4560-496) Penafiel - 285 Rua Província de Pontevedra
description: Quite a large parking lot in front of a sports field with about 25 spaces, also suitable for larger campers. Ideal for families with a skate park and playground. Directly opposite, very cheap and family-friendly pizzeria with its own play tower for children and air conditioning! We stood very quietly 1 night.

name: Quinta da Magantinha
title: (4620-620) Quinta da Magantinha
description: In this wine estate which is also a bed and breakfast, you can take advantage of closed and secure parking. Sufficient space for motorhome, van, car. A breakfast can be offered to you. Send a message to find out availability before coming.

title: (4440-589) Valongo - Rua de R. Nossa Sra. dos Chãos
title_short: (4440-589) Valongo - Rua de R. Nossa Sra. dos Chãos
description: Nice big parking lot at the chapel. Attention : Max. 3.5 tons. The driveway is quite steep but in very good condition. You have a nice view down. There's a bit of rubbish everywhere.

address.street: Rua de R. Nossa Sra. dos Chãos

title: (4765) Guardizela - 428 Rua da Calçada
description: Picnic park where you can make fire, some tables, parking for two vehicles (by the road) without water.

title: (4510) Valongo - 407 Rua Tenente Sá Nogueira
description: Right by the old abandoned sanatorium. Great view. ATTENTION - Access is only possible via the main road (N209) R.Cesario Verde! The access road is in good condition. You can park directly in front of the entrance or a little further up. Since it is a lost place, there is unfortunately a lot of rubbish lying around. However, you have a beautiful view.

title: (4815) Vizela - 629 N106
description: Optimal quiet park to visit Parque das Termas de Vizela. Pingo Doce supermarket, 100m away.

title: (4585) Sobreira - 58 Rua das Pinguelas
description: Nice spot next to the river. It seems like an abandoned bar / picnic area. Stayed the night without any problems. Very calm

title: (4440) Valongo - Corredor Ecológico
description: Place in nature and easy access. A large flat land ideal for motorhome. Some rubbish but beautiful quiet place with some trails in the middle of the forest. Path wide enough paved. No services.

title: (4745) Trofa - E1
description: It’s a gas station with a lot of parking lots, parking lots that fits motorhomes. There’s also a hotel. The grocery is not very large and doesn’t have a variety of items. It’s mainly used by truck drivers.

title: (4445-416) Ermesinde - 3 Rua Ponte dos Moinhos
description: Ample free parking in the center of Ermesinde. Quiet for day and night. Wc payment. the water is very polluted. Children's park.

title: (4440) Valongo - Corredor Ecológico
description: Dusty spot by a river in the middle of the nature, shady and  nearby a small settlement. Not suitable for large vehicles (max length 7m max width 2m). Steep and narrow access with bad route.

title: (4620) Rio Tinto - 342 N207-2
description: Simple parking 250 m from Caide train station to take the train to Pinhao. Departure 8:50 arrival 11:37. Return departure 16h23 arrival 18h25. The train runs along the Douro on 85% of the way, beautiful! And in the opposite direction Porto is 40 minutes.

title: (4585) Recarei -
description: Small place at the bottom of a small path (Max 2m wide) some waste on the ground ... not far from the senhora do salto climbing site

title: (4560) - N319
description: Free day and night parking with restrooms near historic village of Quintandona

title: (4785-187) Trofa - 306 Rua Infante Dom Henrique
description: Self laudry service, modern machines. Wifi and coffee available as well.

title: (4440) Valongo - Rua de Couce
description: Parking at the entrance of the "Serras do Porto" path. Be careful to access it by crossing the village not to have a large motorhome. An L2H2 master passes. The parking lot is small...4 places maximum. And it is a parking lot for hiking departures, going to the climbing site, etc.

title: (4805) Nespereira - Unnamed Road / Capela das Senhoras do Monte, Serzedelo
title_short: (4805) Nespereira - Unnamed Road /  Capela das Senhoras do Monte, Serzedelo
description: Great point of view to land and see the city at night or watch a sunset. Continue to the top to find flatter places. Be careful steep and small ways to get there. Not recommended for motorhomes!

address.street: Unnamed Road /  Capela das Senhoras do Monte, Serzedelo

title: (4435-127) Rio Tinto - 14 Rua Doutor Armando José Pereira Tavares
title_short: (4435-127) Rio Tinto - 14 Rua Doutor Armando José Pereira Tavares
description: Laundry service with 3 machines (9kg  = 4,5 euro + 13 kg = 6 euro + 18 kg = 9 euro).  Drying 3 machines à 18 kg. Nice place. You need to buzz yourself in on a switch on the right side of the door. There’s seats for you to sit while waiting and some tables to fold your clothes on. They have a free Wi-Fi. They have a money changer machines that takes 5, 10 and 20 euro bills.

address.street: 14 Rua Doutor Armando José Pereira Tavares

title: (4585) - N319-2
description: Nice parking to stay, at 5 minute walk from the river and the climbing place, quiet night, close to one 'bar', really cheap. A good place to chill and have a rest.

title: (4435-127) Venda Nova - 179 Avenida Professor Doutor Anibal Cavaco Silva
title_short: (4435-127) Venda Nova - 179 Avenida Professor Doutor Anibal Cavaco Silva
description:
Area opposite the tram station. In 25 minutes you are in the city center.
Drinking water and drainage of gray and black water. During the day there are a lot of cars, so it is better to arrive in the evening.

address.street: 179 Avenida Professor Doutor Anibal Cavaco Silva

title: (4785) Trofa - 647 Rua Cónegos de Landim
description: Small car park opposite the main market square (Attention: market from 6 a.m. to 2 p.m. only on Saturdays). Quiet place, not too much traffic at night. Ideal for troubleshooting one night.

title: (4585) Paredes - Rua da Portela da Senhora
title_short: (4585) Paredes - Rua da Portela da Senhora
description: Beautiful place next to a river with lots of frogs birds and beavers quiet during the day and the night.

title: (4425-193) Águas Santas - Avenida de Dom António Ferreira Gomes
title_short: (4425-193) Águas Santas - Avenida de Dom António Ferreira Gomes
description: Quiet place, in a building street. Surrounded by trees, close to many buses. Forbidden to stay the night

address.street: Avenida de Dom António Ferreira Gomes

title: (4510-591) Fânzeres - 22 Rua Lordelo
description: Perfect place to spend the night and visit the city's train station a two-minute walk away

title: (4350-414) Porto - R. Do Repelão
description: Place near a service area that is also a Park and Ride with metro Fanzeres right in front with a Mercadona near. This area is bigger and have less CC and AC than the other one, so it is a good alternative if it is full or with too much noise.

title: (4760) Ribeirão - 5 Avenida Central
description:
Quiet place to spend the night, we went to visit the Atlantic bird contest.


It's like the back of a shopping center, where trucks usually spend the night. There are public toilets that were surprisingly clean. The street is illuminated with streetlights.

title: (4575-580) Valpedre -
description:
Recently built, beautiful and calm place with all facilities for motorhomes.
Washing basins, bathrooms and showers available. Secure Wi-Fi service. Not possible to use hotel amenities.

title: (4435-481) Rio Tinto - 53 Alameda da Boavista
description: Automatic laundry good access, easy parking on the street. Excellent, pharmacy, supermarket and bakery

title: (4435-485) Rio Tinto - 164 Avenida da Conduta
description:
Self Service laundromat with 3 Washers from 11kg to 20kg and also 3 Dryers.
cash or card accepted. 
snack machine with online payment only (water, juices and snacks).
WI FI available and power plug.

title: (4510) Fânzeres - 364 Travessa Manariz Baixo
description: Park next to passadicos de fanzeres

title: (4805) Tabuadelo - 244 Rua de São Cipriano
description:
A magnificent place surrounded by nature in the countryside but close to the urban center of Guimarães. The owner allows walks through the surrounding woods.
The site has a black and grey discharge center and a water charging point.
There is a cafe and grocery store very close and a supermarket less than 5 minutes away with a gas station.
The owner is still carrying out the construction of the space but already allows its use.
Contact: 960085233

title: (4760) Vila Nova de Famalicão - 5 Rua Frei Bartolomeu dos Mártires
title_short: (4760) Vila Nova de Famalicão - 5 Rua Frei Bartolomeu dos Mártires
description: Parking next to the new Church of Santiago de Antas. Quiet and fairly smooth place to stop to eat. we don't sleep here. but on a weekday it was empty.

name: Agra Pet Campsite
title: (4475-304) Agra Pet Campsite
description:
Agra Pet Campsite is here to welcome you and your pets! ?
There are 7 slots for tents and 2 for vans (max. length 5.5m)

title: (4745) Alvarelhos - N318
description:
Guarded parking space at a park. 4 minute drive (15 minute walk trough the park) from an camper shop. There are toilets, bins and an ice cream stand (closed on our visit in November).
4 long places , where you can stand when it is quiet. The other places were a little short, which can cause problems.

title: (4605) Real - 618 Rua Doutor Joaquim da Silva Cunha
title_short: (4605) Real - 618 Rua Doutor Joaquim da Silva Cunha
description: Nice little parking lot in paved ground Very quiet I only stayed for lunch but I'm sure we can stay the night No service hard this parking lot

address.street: 618 Rua Doutor Joaquim da Silva Cunha

title: (4760-409) Vila Nova de Famalicão - 332 Avenida Marechal Humberto Delgado
title_short: (4760-409) Vila Nova de Famalicão - 332 Avenida Marechal Humberto Delgado
description: Parking next to the park.

title: (4475-076) Castelo da Maia -
description: Parked for 2 nights. Quiet and safe. Residencial area. Close to a Pingo Doce and couple km from a Jumbo.

title: (4785) Trofa - 318 Rua Doutor António Faria
description: Picnic park, quiet but without services. There are tables and cozy shade. There are two tables, it is in the middle of a town in a large park.

name: Chapel Picnic Park
title: (4575) Chapel Picnic Park
description: Parque de merendas de capela. Picnic Park with lots of parking for overnighting. Small bar during peak summer season.

title: (4760-010) Vila Nova de Famalicão - 126 Avenida do Brasil
title_short: (4760-010) Vila Nova de Famalicão - 126 Avenida do Brasil
description: Very clean self-service laundry. Open from 8 am to 11 pm

title: (4575) Penafiel - 212 Avenida São Miguel
description: Intermarché Termas São Vicente (Penafiel - Porto)

title: (4470) Maia - R. Chascada
description: It is a huge parking lot in a Commercial Area (Auchan, JOM, Norauto, Low Cost Fuel and Gas, MacDonalds, etc). Access must be made from the back of Auchan and in the direction of the Fuel Pump. The Park is enormous and safe. Close to Metro but close to "Parque Industrial" or "Mandim". It can be a little noisy as it faces the road.

title: (4475) Maia - 329 Rua Bernardino Machado
description: Great place to wash even big campervans. Helpful staff and fair prices.

title: (4470) Gueifães - 1201 Rua Luís da Silva Neves
title_short: (4470) Gueifães - 1201 Rua Luís da Silva Neves
description: Electricity of water pump

title: (4425) Pedrouços - 26 Rua Rodrigues de Freitas
description: Nice to pass

title: (4465-004) Pedrouços - 119 Rua das Cavadas
description: Shady parking all morning. There is a park very close. There were almost no cars, I think it's a university area. We have been very calm

title: (4470) Maia - R. Castanheira
description: Laundry in the gallery of Auchan!!

title: (4560) Penafiel - 260 Rua Bento Peixoto
description: Drinking water point, easy to fill water bottle

title: (4560-055) Castelões - A4
description: Gas station parking. There is a well reserved place where you can spend the night

title: (4470-177) Maia - 248 Rua Ângela Adelaide Calheiros Carvalho Meneses
title_short: (4470-177) Maia - 248 Rua Ângela Adelaide Calheiros Carvalho Meneses
description:
Self-service laundry
 Convenient to park in front

address.street: 248 Rua Ângela Adelaide Calheiros Carvalho Meneses

title: (4465) São Mamede de Infesta - 55 Rua Maria Feliciana
title_short: (4465) São Mamede de Infesta - 55 Rua Maria Feliciana
description: Good place to stay and sleep

title: (4610) - 2078 CM1160
description: Parking of the monastery "Santa Maria de Pombeiro" Overnight possible.

title: (4470-407) Maia - 390B Rua José Maria Carvalho Ramos
title_short: (4470-407) Maia - 390B Rua José Maria Carvalho Ramos
description: Parking lot for the Metro and Commercial Area. It has a lot of space and is safe. It has the Metro station "Parque Industrial" where you can buy the ticket to visit Maia, Porto, Matosinhos, etc. There is an Ecopath nearby that goes towards the Maia Zoo. It can be busy during the day . It has Auchan….relatively close, as well as restaurants

title: (4475) Barca - Rua de José Moreira da Silva
title_short: (4475) Barca - Rua de José Moreira da Silva
description: It is a parking space at the "Mandim" Metro Station. Since we have a lot of free space with ACs, we can park freely. Appropriate place to park / spend the night, embora esteja longe de tudo. I don't have the Metro at 20 more and I can visit Maia, Porto, Matosinhos, etc. You can buy senha for or Metro in a vending machine. Tem um Ecocaminho 50 meters away from the Maia Zoo and the center of Maia

address.street: Rua de José Moreira da Silva

title: (4805) Guimarães - Rua dos Carvalhais
description: Decathlon parking. 10 minutes from the historic center. In the city we park relatively close to the center.

title: (4560) - Rua do Salgueiral
description: Small earthen car park just above the spot on the edge of the Drouo. No service but allows you to spend a quiet night away from the bar which al ere to sing all evening on this Saturday. Place flat and quite far from the road. So pretty cool

title: (4745) Alvarelhos - Avenida do Santuário
description: Great sunrise and far views in all directions on a hilltop next to a church. Two small bars/restaurants are nearby. The water tap is accessible. When I was there in October, the toilets were closed and there was no event going on at the church. You have to make friends with the sound of the bell, since it rings from 6 in the morning until 22h. Perfect for morning meditation, since the bell make sure that you stay focused ;)

title: (4560) -
description: Great paved spot by the water with shadows and picnic areas. A bar open until midnight can cause a bit of noise at night, but it's also a great place to have a beer.

title: (4350-158) Porto - 2 Colónia Antero de Quental
description: Gas station with water. Sometimes stops flowing, but with patience we filled up our tank in maybe 15 min

title: (4300-340) Porto - 148 Travessa Bonjóia
description: From the sleeping area you have a wonderful view over Porto and the Campanha train station is only a 15-minute walk away. Unfortunately it is quite noisy because of the big street, but that didn't bother us.

title: (4350-226) Porto - 202 Rua do Monte Aventino
description: Free parking spot with space for our Mercedes’ sprinter. We parked here and stayed in an Airbnb in the centre for 3 days and it was perfect for that. I think it would be quiet to spend the night and quite flat. No longer vehicles than 6m I imagine

title: (4200) Porto - 369 Rua Oliveira Martins
description: Flat place to park and spend the night, seemingly quiet

title: (4350-085) Porto - 171 Rua Carlos Graça
description: A few parking spaces along a park. Slightly sloping. Glass bins at the end of the street, A little traffic during the day, little during the night. Lidl store approx. 500m bus station to get to the city center. May be suitable for 2-3 nights.

title: (4805) Guimarães - 601 Rua de São Miguel
description: Large flat and open parking lot at empty industrial hall. Apparently free to use for parking.

title: (4200-105) Porto -
description:
Quiet avenue with free parking spaces.
 Near a supermarket (incl. Toilets and cash machine) and a lunchroom.
The public park / children's playground "Quinta do Covelo" and the metro station "Salgueiros" are both a 5 minute walk.

title: (4810) Calvos - 1541 Rua da Lapinha
description: Picnic area next to a sanctuary with parking spaces suitable for long vans. Fountain with drinking water and rubbish bins. Very calm.

title: (4810) Calvos - 350 EM579 2
description: Parking in the ground, near the Lapinho sanctuary. No services, but the possibility of spending the night. View of the valley. Only concern, the sanctuary rings every hour ...?

title: (4810-534) Guimarães - 1282 Avenida Dom João IV
description: Free car park next to Guimaraes train station. Shopping center and supermarket 3 minutes, Palacio Cultural Center Vila Flor 5 minutes walk.

title: (4200-021) Porto - 7 Rua Agra do Amial
description: Clothes laundry. Clothes basket

title: (4420-521) Valbom - 201 N108
description: Parking on the banks of the Douro with a view of the river, bridges and Porto in the background. Entrances and exits in the direction of Porto only and difficult to access for vehicles with pronounced overhangs and wheelbases! 10 seats. Start of walks along the Douro on foot or by bike.

title: (4000-191) Porto - 139 Rua do Major David Magno
title_short: (4000-191) Porto - 139 Rua do Major David Magno
description:
Peaceful place. You will have a art school in the block, but they are cool people.
I stay there 3 days and nights and don't have complains, you will have a big market (lidl) and a café near by.
This place is nearby the center of porto.

title: (4835-010) Guimarães - 703 Rua Professor Abel Salazar
description: Free parking spaces, at the front of the apartments, suitable for small camper vans <6 mtr. On the other side a large shopping center.

title: (4300-241) Porto - 54 Rua Conselheiro Correia de Barros
title_short: (4300-241) Porto - 54 Rua Conselheiro Correia de Barros
description: Parcking space in a dead end street, very calm during night and day. There is an elementary school beside, so it may be noisy during the day when hollydays are over. It is not far from the city center, not far from a bouldering hall! a lot of cars are parked, but during the 2 days we where there, there was always some free space.

title: (4810) Guimarães - N101-2
description: Free camper pitch, only for parking

title: (4515) Foz do Sousa - 750 Rua das Águas
title_short: (4515) Foz do Sousa - 750 Rua das Águas
description: Small picnic area at the edge of De Sousa River. We heard no one during the night and no one came before 10am. Only 15-20 minutes from the center of Porto it is very convenient. Possibility to swim in the river. Attention arrive well by the Ruas das Aguas because the gps can make come by a dirt road at the exit of the A43.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 56 Rua Monte de Santa Catarina
title_short: (4810) Guimarães - 56 Rua Monte de Santa Catarina
description: Just outside the entrance to the official camping (Parque Campismo da Penha) is a relatively large parking lot with convenient parking spaces of no fixed length. Lots of shade. Avoid driving uphill from the north (Quintas) as there are steep inclines and narrow streets. Better access if you drive from near Guimaraes center. Public toilets are a short walk away towards the main car park and church (unknown opening hours).

title: (4300) Porto - 126 Travessa das Eirinhas
description: Parking next to a hospital. Quiet, 30-40 minutes walk from the city center. very wide parking with several sectors. Makes a good impression with the naked eye. No problem as we read about the surroundings.

name: Parque Campismo de Penha
title: (4810) Parque Campismo de Penha
description: Great campsite with pool and restaurant. Very friendly staff. Shaded and in the trees. At the top of the gondola/cable car so perfect for visiting this beautiful little town and the rock structures of Penha.

title: (4810-000) Guimaraes - Unnamed Road
description: On the road to the campsite, 200 meters before arriving at the parking lot, you will find a path that goes down to a picnic table. If you ever miss the path you will see the spot which is just below the road. We spent a very good night there in peace and the next day we took advantage of the shade of the trees and the walks and monuments nearby. The spot is only accessible for one small van.

title: (4420) Valbom - 119 Rua Clube Naval Infante Dom Henrique
title_short: (4420) Valbom - 119 Rua Clube Naval Infante Dom Henrique
description: Safe place. Next to a park with a children's area (toys, zip line, climbing). Near the Douro River (river beach and promenade), bar and bathroom.

address.street: 119 Rua Clube Naval Infante Dom Henrique

title: (4810-225) Guimarães - 493 Rua Camilo Castelo Branco
description: Rammed earth car park, in a quiet residential area a stone's throw from the historic center. Quiet night.

title: (4770) Cruz - 480 Largo Senhor dos Aflitos

title: (4515-162) Foz do Sousa - 102 Rua da Escola Velha
title_short: (4515-162) Foz do Sousa - 102 Rua da Escola Velha
description: Good local. Very good!

title: (4810) Guimaraes - R. das 3 Bicas
description: Semi-quiet, many couples go up, good to spend the day, safe, incredible views

title: (4300) Porto - 495 Rua de Barros Lima
description: Good possibility to park the motorhome, for a trip to the city center of Porto. The parking lot is right next to the cemetery Bonfim. The city center is about 2 km walk. To stay it is probably too loud and a bit weird. We parked here twice, saw other campers park here and had great days in Porto. No service and no restrictions.

title: (4430) Vila Nova de Gaia - Rua da Pedra Salgada
title_short: (4430) Vila Nova de Gaia - Rua da Pedra Salgada
description: Perfect place to sleep or spend a day. Quite large with many squares. not a single noise.

title: (4200-604) Porto - 131 Rua Professor Joaquim Bastos
description: Quiet place in an urbanization, in front of lidl. Good to park during the day or spend the night quietly. 30 min walk from the center.

title: (4470-605) Moreira - 440 Rua Conselheiro Luís Magalhães
description: Drinking water - Repsol station

title: (4820) Fafe - 79 Rua de Oleiros
description: Picnic area with 6 tables, tables and a double barbecue. Little shade but to make a stop on the way to eat is great.

title: (4430-867) Avintes - 86 Rua Paço
description: It's next to the road. It's not on the ground next door because we could not get in because of the puddles. Next to Del Río, an avenue. Very calm. A little noise if cars pass quickly.

title: (4575) Rio de Moinhos - 543 Rua Souto
description: Large parking lot, empty all day. At night a bit of passage because the young people meet here, but it remains calm. The view is very nice, and if you have any concerns there is a great mechanic nearby. Quite a few strays though, so my dogs spent quite a bit of time barking. There is a park 20min walk away, and the douro is 30min away. There is a hiking trail that starts from the town. Attention, no shade, spot exposed from 09:00 to evening. And quite difficult to access because narrow street and people park there. My cc is 2m15 wide, and 6.80 long: that was right.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 9 Rua Nossa Senhora da Penha
title_short: (4810) Guimarães - 9 Rua Nossa Senhora da Penha
description: Parking easily accessible and with a lot of shade. It is a very quiet and endearing area just 10 minutes from Guimaraes.

name: Camping Ave
title: (4480) Camping Ave
description:
For nature lovers

Welcome to the Camping Ave, located on one of the largest courses of water in northern Portugal – Rio Ave, which will flow into the Atlantic Ocean, a distance of few kilometres. The beaches of Vila do Conde and Póvoa de Varzim, are the sites closest to the park for all salt-water beachgoers.
Perfectly framed in nature, which has enriched with its vegetation carefully selected with care to preserve the national species and in order to move closer to vegetation in northern Europe.
Here it is natural to enjoy a peaceful scenario, ideal for nature lovers, and all those whose work and stress of life that we live call for a break, either on holiday or weekends, as great way to regain energy.
For those who prefer urban centers, with all their social, gastronomy, monuments, recreation and culture, Camping Ave is equidistant from the various urban centers of northern Portugal, to know: Vila do Conde, Póvoa de Varzim, Porto, Vila Nova de Famalicão, Trofa, Barcelos, Braga…
Thank you for your inquiry and look forward to your visit.

title: (4430) Oliveira do Douro - 340 Alameda Areinho
description: A little complicated place to get to but quite a quiet place to spend the night. They have a shower service schedule. In summer it is much more crowded than in winter, autumn. It takes 30 minutes to walk from there to the part where the wineries are.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 17 N101-2
description: Below another car park opposite the restaurants, this car park is quieter and better equipped for spending the night. We found a flat spot next to the big rock.

title: (4430-767) Avintes - 846 Rua Areinho
description: Public beach shower next to a bathing beach, BBQ stations and a small soccer field. Great Portuguese snack bar with pool table and outdoor area 200m up the road.

title: (4510-113) Jovim - 548 Rua dos Praia
description: A place where you can park and walk until the little beach near the acess and enjoy  a quiet day.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 8 Rua Nossa Senhora da Penha
title_short: (4810) Guimarães - 8 Rua Nossa Senhora da Penha
description:
Large car park at the Santuario de Penha. Very nice and quiet
Beautiful Sunset and View

title: (4810) Guimarães - Rua Bernardino Jordão
description: Day / night parking on dirt adjacent to the official parking area. Suitable if you have vehicles longer than 6.5 meters. A short distance away (50 meters) there are the loading and unloading columns of the parking area. The historic center is about 8-10 minutes on foot

title: (4430) Avintes - 704 Rua Areinho
description: We had spent a first night on the pier a little higher. For our 2nd night we went down to the beach. You will find barbecue, table, clean public toilets, beach shower... the place stays clean. Despite a large attendance by residents on August 15, we were able to sleep there calmly.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 220C Parque das Hortas
description: The other parking was used for a funfair, so we took this car park. I only recommend it in case of emergency, it is very noisy. Do not hesitate to use the cable car to explore the old town ...

title: (4810-025) Guimarães - Rua do Rei Pegu
description: Day parking for long vehicles, ideal for visiting the city, about 15 minutes from the center on foot. Busy during the day and without services.

title: (4810) Guimarães - Rua do Rei Pegu
description:
Parking area in cord. Free parking. One way street and very well located.
We have been here two days and no problem.
At the foot of the funicular and 15 minutes walking, with children of the Castle.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 147 Rua José Faria Martins
description: Perfect place to visit the city. The parking lot is located directly at the valley station of the cable car to Serra da Pehna. The access road is not very wide. And the places quite narrow and short.

title: (4800-073) Guimarães -
description: Large public car park at Guimaraes football stadium. Supermarket and old center 5 minutes walk.

title: (4510-001) Jovim - 1779 Rua da Aldeia
description: A quiet stop on the Douro.  A small passage on this little road as there is direct access to a small beach. Small snack, ice cream. No service. Forbidden to stay overnight.

title: (4625) Favões - Unnamed Road
description: River beach, very peaceful and cleaned. A lot of people camping over night. Ideal for relax, take sun and swimming. The access is steep not ideal for the biggest campervans.

title: (4510-036) Jovim - Av. Beira Rio
description: Place to park 1 or 2 trucks or motorhomes (but not too big). We preferred this place to the other side as peaceful at night and not frequented by young people at night. Just 1 fisherman or 2. We spent a quiet night without noise, apart from the usual barking of Portuguese dogs from time to time (you will have to explain to me why in this country we hear dogs barking every night everywhere where we go !!)

title: (4430) Avintes - 446 Rua Areinho
description: Close to town, dirt parking. Good for a night out. Close to the river.

title: (4300) Porto -
description: Public shower and laundry, shower, toilets. a washing machine

title: (4430-316) Vila Nova de Gaia - Marginal Areinho
title_short: (4430-316) Vila Nova de Gaia - Marginal Areinho
description:
Large parking lot with bar, toilet and shower (on the beach) and quiet. A few fishermen and hikers. View of the Douro.
It is better to approach with large motorhomes via Torre Bella east of the A4!

title: (4300-197) Porto - 159 Rua do Conde de Ferreira
title_short: (4300-197) Porto - 159 Rua do Conde de Ferreira
description: Street parking for nominal fee (free on the weekend!!)… up to 4hrs… Some long bays between trees, I’m an L4H3 and got in comfortable… - not suitable for ‘proper’ motorhomes, just vans I think. If you come to this location, then neighbouring streets have lots of bays similar! About a 15min walk to the center but lots of cafes on way!

name: Woodstill Oaks
title: (4760-783) Woodstill Oaks
description:
We are creating a space inserted in nature.

Updates: 
- Access to the property widened to 4 meters;
- There are several vines sprouting through the ground. We kindly ask you to be as careful as possible when moving around the property;
- We kindly ask you to contact us to confirm space availability. 

Under development.
It is a property with natural fence about 50 meters from the municipal road in an extremely quiet place for contemplation of nature.  Access to the property is 4 meters wide.  At the moment we can only offer tranquility in a reserved space.  We love our trees very much;  some older than us.
 We kindly ask you to respect the space;  we have our vines growing and we think there is room for everyone, the campers and the existing nature.  We don't even have a garbage disposal as we believe that each user will take their own to the nearest place, about 150 meters from the exit.
 About 150 meters from the site, there is an equestrian center and an excellent restaurant if you want to try the local cuisine.  Within a radius of 1 km you can also visit good wine cellars and cheese makers selling to the public.  There are markets, bakeries and a bank very close to the site.
It is expressly forbidden to throw garbage to the floor and make fire.

title: (4430) Avintes - 3 Rua Esteiro
description: Place at the edge of the water ideal for motorhome of 7m40 and very calm while being lulled by the noise of the ocean. Narrow but very good, 10min from downtown and small restaurant 200m with very good country cuisine and very welcoming staff despite the language barrier.

title: (4800-432) Guimarães - 1 Largo Martins Sarmento
description: Next to palace drinking fountain for water bottles

title: (4800-073) Azurém - 442 Rua Teixeira de Pascoais
description: Laundromat with wifi

title: (4515) Covelo - 9 Praceta Santa Isabel
description: Parking around a large paved square. Possibility to spend the night in peace on the back, away from the road. Step to start the Douro Valley. No service except for a few small trash cans around the square.

title: (4300-385) Porto - Av. Gustavo Eiffel
description: Parking space under the trees and near the gas station. Along the Douro River

title: (4050-221) Porto - 449 Rua de Alves Redol
description: Just a parking space

title: (4430-769) Avintes - 60 Rua Azenha
description:
A park next to the beach, you can spend a few hours. 
It has a bar near the beach if you need toilets or drinks.

title: (4460) Maciel - 75 Rua Ana Augusta Neves Teixeira
title_short: (4460) Maciel - 75 Rua Ana Augusta Neves Teixeira
description: Parking near the metro. ideal for visiting Porto, it takes about 15 minutes by metro to reach the center. we felt safe. we spent 2 very quiet nights.

title: (4300-059) Porto - 69 Largo Padre Baltasar Guedes
description: Parking in front of the official fire department building. Small impasse just below, a lot of shade, flat and relatively quiet at night. We stayed 2 nights. 1.5km walk from the center of Porto.

title: (4300) Porto - 38B Praça da Alegria
description: Free, drinkable water. Free parking places (not a lot but still free), lots of shade and some stone banches.

title: (4000) Porto - 219 Rua de Gonçalo Cristóvão
description: Parking on the street. Space under the aerial street of 6m long.

title: (4000-526) Porto - 287 Av. de Rodrigues de Freitas
title_short: (4000-526) Porto - 287 Av. de Rodrigues de Freitas
description: Some relatively long parking spots under the shadow of trees. Good to park a van/small RV for a short visit to the city. Max. parking duration is 2h but you can buy a new ticket after this time. Shops/Cafes/Restaurants nearby.

title: (4430) Vila Nova de Gaia - 40 Travessa de Sá
title_short: (4430) Vila Nova de Gaia - 40 Travessa de Sá
description: Fountain with drinking water

title: (4000) Porto - Largo da Lapa
description: Safe and quiet area to spend the day . In the Church area paid parking.

title: (4470) Moreira - 6 Rua Primeiro de Maio
description: Good parking Park & ​​Ride located directly (20m) on the purple metro line E at the airport (3 stations) or Porto. We spent one night in early November looking for someone at the airport and we felt very comfortable there. Parking was in our time only a little busy but for the big WoMo it's pretty tight. The metro ticket, which you can buy by machine with money or a credit card has a value of 60 cents and can still be charged to the machine. You need to determine how many areas you want to drive and how many people. The ticket must be activated at the yellow terminal before the trip and go to another line. The terminal also shows how long it is still valid.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 15 Rua Dona Urraca
description: It is a fairly wide street where you can stop the motorhome, without traffic and overlooking the castle of Guimaraës. It is very quiet, the only thing that you can not park from 9:00 pm to 7:00 am, so you can not stay overnight. 50 meters from the castle.

title: (4300-059) Porto - Av. Gustavo Eiffel
description: Parking at the curb, directly on the edge of the Douro. Very safe because fishermen are there and there is a lot of pedestrian and car traffic.

title: (4470-558) Moreira - 302 Rua das Oliveiras
description: Park of Metro Parking "Pedras Rubras". The terrain is sloping a bit. It has a lot of space available and it is safe. At the Metro station (50 mts) to reach Maia, Porto, Matosinhos, etc. Personal restaurants time.

title: (4000-269) Porto - 331 Rua de Gonçalo Cristóvão
description: Is an underground parking with up to 2,3mts

title: (4300) Porto - Av. Gustavo Eiffel
description: Free and wide parking next to a busy road in the center of Porto, next to the Douro. There is a small natural spring in the area, although it is somewhat inconvenient to access. It is not the best place but with light it looks nice.

title: (4250-316) Porto - 309 Rua do Monte dos Burgos
title_short: (4250-316) Porto - 309 Rua do Monte dos Burgos
description: Excellent free parking area, well located. Without disturbing anyone. No clean waters, no dirty waters.

title: (4575) Quebrada - 153 Rua de Barco do Souto
title_short: (4575) Quebrada - 153 Rua de Barco do Souto
description: Small parking lot with some picnic tables very quiet

title: (4810) Guimarães - 354 Rua Professor Egas Moniz
description: Shaded street and flat to spend the day and night. Attention garage on the cob so difficult for more than six meters. Park and city center nearby.

title: (4810) Infantas - 189 Travessa 24 de Junho
description: Quite location by the wood on meadow. Hard to camp anywhere around. No service here.

title: (4635) Toutosa - 28 Rua Toutosa
description: Nice place in the center of a calm village, shop on the square and a public toilet available.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 36 Rua de Dona Mafalda
description:
Very large free parking in front of the castle. Lots of trees and shaded places. No parking from 21:00 to 07:00.

Ps: this is NOT the battlefield of the battle of Sao Mamede. Google Maps lies :>>

title: (4630) - 2633 N210
description: Quiet place in the aisles. Park and stay next to the houses next to the church at the door. But if it is closed there is another one opposite which is wide and open.

title: (4000-054) Porto - 75 Rua de Alexandre Herculano
description: 3 washing machines and 2 dryers

title: (4460-710) Custóias -
description: A place for temporary accommodation, free of charge and right next to the metro that goes straight to Porto. Seems pretty sure to me personally.

title: (4000-198) Porto - 52 Rua de Entreparedes
description:
Marlin Wash
3 washing machines, 2 dryers

title: (4800) Fermentões - 64 Rua das Coradeiras de Baixo
title_short: (4800) Fermentões - 64 Rua das Coradeiras de Baixo
description: Pic nic al lado del rio hay un Puente Romano fuente mesas barbacoa

title: (4515-542) Montezelo - 357 Rua do Montezelo
description: Parking at the leisure center, small grocery store open very late. Many places available, sloping access, beware of the hitch that rubbed when leaving. Calm at night but beware of the rooster in the early morning. No possibility of emptying. Convenient for a night in troubleshooting given the few areas in this region.

title: (4470-558) Moreira - 48 Rua de Matos
description: Quiet place to park and stay overnight,street with plenty of lighting and people passing by walking pets and doing sports,also usually be on the street hawkers of fruits and vegetables,laundry nearby and several restaurants,you can not park only on Thursday from 00:00 to 17 because there is a fair on the site.Near the airport.

title: (4050-021) Porto - 71 Rua do Melo
description: Parking fee limited to 4 hours a day

title: (4515) Covelo - Praceta Gastão Fernandes Guedes
description: Parking possible at the marina, attention to cantilever    slope, we arrived at night, certainly little room in the day, noisy cafe with lots of cars on weekends

title: (4485-860) Vilar do Pinheiro - 1302 Travessa Jose Martins Maia
title_short: (4485-860) Vilar do Pinheiro - 1302 Travessa Jose Martins Maia
description: Seller campingaz. Bottle 907 in exchange for an empty one.

title: (4515-027) Covelo - 719 N108
description: In front of the Douro river. Beautiful view. Parking only. No services Bar and Marina next door. Safe place.

title: (4515) Lomba - Rua da Bouça
description: Very nice place on Praia da Lomba, right at the end of the peninsula. The parking lot is directly at the lido, which is why there are many parking spaces. ATTENTION: The way there could be too narrow / steep for some vehicles. However, the view is worth the effort.

title: (4000) Porto - 17 Rua da Conceição
description: Very central lavadaria and close to monuments.

title: (4050-359) Porto - 78 Praça do Coronel Pacheco
description:
Payed parking close to the city centre. Perfect to explore Porto on a day trip. It's not suitable for big campers, but there is enough space for smaller ones like VW Bus, Ford Nugget and short Sprinter like vans. You can stay a maximum of 2h, but you can always come back and pay for another 2h.
There are some beggars that help on finding a spot and at the ticket machine. They look after the car if you give them some money, which worked for us at least.

title: (4000-098) Porto - 28 Passeio das Fontainhas
description: Roadside parking in a cul-de-sac. Access via narrower streets. Very empty even on a Saturday and there were a few vacancies. Busy with cars during the day during the week. Above is a paid parking lot with other large parking spaces.

title: (4515-027) Covelo - 89 Rua Combatente Rolando Santos Pinto
title_short: (4515-027) Covelo - 89 Rua Combatente Rolando Santos Pinto
description: Park near Douro river

title: (4430-999) Vila Nova de Gaia - 1 Rua 1
description: Good parking with a view, I do not know for overnight stay, just over the main street, very empty, city is within a few minutes walk.

title: (4430-999) Vila Nova de Gaia - 9 Rua 1
description: This is free parking near the river. Good for parking and staying 1 night. No service but close to the bridge to Porto.

title: (4515-345) Medas - 472 Avenida Central de Broalhos
description: Self-service laundromat 24/24

title: (4000) Porto - 90 Avenida Gustavo Eiffel
description: On the roadside but with a view of the Douro and 1.5 km from the Louis Bridge (beginning of the city center) The most practical place in Porto! Accessible to all motorhomes because there is no marking on the ground. Fountains along the sidewalk, swimming possible at the bottom of the cliff. (accessible by stairs). It remains a noisy roadside. Please note that access is closed every Sunday, reserved for bicycles and pedestrians.

title: (4515-552) Melres - 80 Rua Padre Jerónimo
description: Parking in a green area next to the Duero river and with a river beach, bars, restaurants, supermarket and showers on the beach. Very quiet place to spend the night and very good access for motorhomes even with a trailer.

title: (4470-558) Moreira - 1509 Avenida do Aeroporto
description: Parking space in front of a hotel.  Place recommended by the people we rented the van from.

title: (4000) Porto - 95 Rua dos Caldeireiros
description: Laundry in downtown area of Porto, prices are not cheap but it works well and the place is very neat. Prices include detergent and fabric softener. It works from 7:00 to 00:00 from Monday to Monday.

title: (4515) Covelo - 833-865 Rua Combatente Rolando Santos Pinto
title_short: (4515) Covelo - 833-865 Rua Combatente Rolando Santos Pinto
description: Park  near Douro river to rest

title: (4000-013) Porto - 9 Rua do Corpo da Guarda
title_short: (4000-013) Porto - 9 Rua do Corpo da Guarda
description: Trash can and water fountain right in front of Sé Cathedral. There is also plenty of parking space for small vehicles and VAN n (no motorhome). However, be careful with parking.
